outputs.output_descr: Support to Resident Coordination - The UN Resident Coordinator is the head of the United Nations Disaster Management Team (UNDMT), an inter-agency working group to deal with disaster-related emergency situations in the country. Under the overall supervision of the UNRC and the direct supervision of the UNDMT Chair, the UNDMT Convenor convenes the UNDMT, and the Disaster Management Units of UN Agencies provide the necessary technical support. UNDMT Associate assists with facilitating inputs and coordinating with UN Agencies for implementation of and reporting on the UNDMT component of the UNCT work plan.

project_descr: Support to Resident Coordination activities in India.
